links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: A050452 := proc(n)        a := 0 ;        for d in numtheory[divisors](n) do                if d mod 4 = 3 then                        a := a+d ;                end if;        end do:        a;end proc:seq(A050452(n),n=1..40) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 20 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 23 1999
